name: Scrapper_Melee.Broad_Sword
display_help: Wield a Broad Sword and master a variety of powerful Lethal attacks. Slower than a Katana, the Broad Sword's weight strikes with more force and damage. The Broadsword can reduce an enemy's Defense, allowing other attacks to hit more reliably. The Broad Sword is a powerful melee weapon that has a bonus to Accuracy. Like all scrapper powers, all Broad Sword attacks can sometimes land a critical hit for double damage.

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Broad_Sword.Hack
powers.display_help: You Hack your opponent for a high amount of damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 99.80% chance for -7.50% strength to defense for 10s on target
5.00% chance for 130.97 lethal damage on target [CRITICAL]
5.00% chance for 102.60 lethal damage on target [CRITICAL]
10.00% chance for 102.60 lethal damage on target [CRITICAL]
Only against targets tougher than minion class

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Broad_Sword.Slash
powers.display_help: You perform a quick Slash that can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. This attack causes moderate damage, but has a quick recharge time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

display_info: 99.80% chance for -7.50% strength to defense for 6s on target

5.00% chance for 62.56 lethal damage on target [CRITICAL]
10.00% chance for 62.56 lethal damage on target [CRITICAL]

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Broad_Sword.Slice
powers.display_help: You Slice your sword in a wide arc, attacking all enemies in front of you. Slice does less damage than Hack but can hit multiple foes and reduce their defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 7 ft. radius 130° arc (5 targets max)

display_info: 99.80% chance for -7.50% strength to defense for 10s on target

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Broad_Sword.Build_Up
powers.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

display_info: 100.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Broad_Sword.Parry
powers.display_help: You can use this power to Parry incoming melee attacks. The Parry itself does minor damage, but every successful hit will increase your Defense against melee and lethal attacks for a short while. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 15.00% strength to melee, lethal for 10s on self
5.00% chance for 115.10 lethal damage on target [CRITICAL]
5.00% chance for 52.55 lethal damage on target [CRITICAL]
10.00% chance for 52.55 lethal damage on target [CRITICAL]
Only against targets tougher than minion class

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Broad_Sword.Taunt
powers.display_help: Challenges a foe to attack you. Useful to pull a villain off an ally who finds themselves in over their head. A To Hit check required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: -75.00% strength to range for 12s on target

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Broad_Sword.Whirling_Sword
powers.display_help: You perform a Whirling Sword maneuver, attacking all foes in melee range. This attack wounds your opponents, causing them to take minor damage over time and reduces their defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

display_info: 3 ticks of 6.26 lethal damage over 2.1s on target after 1s delay

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Broad_Sword.Head_Splitter
powers.display_help: You perform a devastating Head Splitter attack that deals a massive amount of damage and can even knock a foe down to the ground and reduce it's Defense. This attack has an exceptionally good critical hit capability, better than other Broadsword attacks, that can sometimes deal double damage. The power of this attack can actually extend a short distance through multiple foes. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 10 ft. radius 20° arc (5 targets max)
